entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:38 PM MST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 12:38 PM MST Monday 3 April 2023
